Posts.Content: rdcraven wrote: my daughter started with breast cancer.  After having both removed she had chemo and radiation.  The cancer is now in her bones from her hip to her neck.  Chemo is out of the question until the pain is under control.  She has been in the hospital for over a week, and still the pain is unreal.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: my daughter rdcraven shafali
